message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value to you, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is firm. I know it's a significant investment, but the value this product will bring you makes it worthwhile. I'm confident you'll see a strong return on this. Would you be willing to reconsider?
